display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index: (All apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal, hypopneas with 30%-50% flow reduction and with >= 4% oxygen desaturation, and hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction with >= 3% oxygen desaturation) / hour of sleep  from type III home sleep apnea test
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events
